variants.Description in input context: Gly2385Arg variant associated with increased risk of Parkinson's disease

Material used.Description: Genotyping of 938 Parkinson's disease cases and 938 healthy controls for the LRRK2 Gly2385Arg variant.

Readout description.Result Description: The Gly2385Arg variant was associated with a 1.7-fold increased risk of Parkinson's disease (OR=1.7, 95% CI=1.2-2.4).

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Multivariate logistic regression model adjusted for age, sex, and ethnicity.
